name: greater or lesser
description:
Greater or Less, puzzle game for everyone. improve your comparing skill now!

Are you a hothead people? Did you ever feel confuse with your logic?
If yes and you want to fix that, Greater or Less can help you!

This game is not just a number-to-number comparison, it's about group of picture that you need to compare to another. It is a nice game to practice your logic-thinking, calculating and concentration skill.


DOWNLOAD NOW!!!
publishers: Perumal Technology and Telecommunication Co., Thailand
